title: Full transcript of "Face the Nation" on January 2, 2022

sentence: Representative Liz Cheney said Sunday on "Face the Nation" that she expects former President Trump to "make the same false claims about the election that he knows to be false and the same false claims about the election that he knows caused violence on January 6" at his event on the one-year anniversary of the attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Caroline Linton
title: Cheney says House January 6 panel "will not be deterred" despite dangers from Trump claims
